Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers

Class CharacterController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.FXMLController
it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.controllers.CharacterController
public class CharacterController extends FXMLController
CharacterController controls the character sub scene that appears in the main scene when a player selects a character image.
See Also:
  • FXMLController

    private class 
    CharacterController.CharacterInputManager
    CharacterInputManager is an inner class of the CharacterController that controls the input of the character

      public CharacterController()

  • Method Details

    • show

      public void show(int characterId)
      Shows the character dialog in the center of the main game scene
      Parameters:
      characterId - the id of the character that will be shown

    • init

      public void init(javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane mainSceneRoot, GameMainSceneController gameMainSceneController)
      Initialize the character dialog by adding it to the specified root of the main scene in a position that cannot be seen by the user and by binding this controller with the controller of the main scene
      Parameters:
      mainSceneRoot - the root anchor pane of the main scene
      gameMainSceneController - the controller of the main scene

    • closeCharacterView

      void closeCharacterView(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Makes the character not visible in the main scene after the close button is pressed
      Parameters:
      event - the event fired when pressing the close button

    • playCharacter

      void playCharacter(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      If all inputs that the character needs to have are inserted, the character is played and the action string that will be passed to the core part of the client is constructed.
      Parameters:
      event - the event fired when pressing the play character button

    • onError

      public void onError(ErrorMessageType error, String errorInfo)
      Display an error i n the dialog that informs that the user have to do something before playing the character
      Specified by:
      onError in class FXMLController
      Parameters:
      error - the type of error
      errorInfo - the description of the error

    • setOptions

      private void setOptions()
      Sets the options that need to be selected by the user in order to play the character. The user will see them on the right side of the character image

    • makePlayCharacterButtonClickable

      private void makePlayCharacterButtonClickable()
      Make the play character button clickable after the user have selected all the options for playing the character

    • getIslandSelectionButton

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox getIslandSelectionButton(String labelText)
      Returns a VBox that contains a form for selecting an island that will be added to the character options
      Parameters:
      labelText - the text of the label for the form
      Returns:
      a VBox that contains a form for selecting an island that will be added to the character options

    • getStudentsNumberSelectionButton

      private Pair<javafx.scene.layout.VBox,javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<Integer>> getStudentsNumberSelectionButton(int numStudents)
      Returns a form used to choose the number of students that will be swapped in character 7 or 10. The first element of the returned pair is the form (choice box + label), the second is the specific choice box that the user will have to fill
      Parameters:
      numStudents - the maximum number of students that the choice box will permit to select
      Returns:
      the form used to choose the number of students that will be swapped in character 7 or 10

    • getSelectCharacterStudentsButton

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox getSelectCharacterStudentsButton(int maxStudents, javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<Integer> choiceBox)
      Returns a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the character
      Parameters:
      maxStudents - the maximum number of students that can be selected from the character
      choiceBox - the choice box from which the number of students that can be selected is taken, the choice box is filled by the user before doing the character students selection
      Returns:
      a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the character

    • getSelectEntranceStudentsButton

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox getSelectEntranceStudentsButton(int maxStudents, javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<Integer> choiceBox)
      Returns a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the entrance of the user's school.
      Parameters:
      maxStudents - the maximum number of students that can be selected from the entrance
      choiceBox - the choice box from which the number of students that can be selected is taken, the choice box is filled by the user before doing the character students selection
      Returns:
      a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the entrance of the user's school.

    • getSelectDiningRoomStudentsButton

      private javafx.scene.layout.VBox getSelectDiningRoomStudentsButton(int maxStudents, javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<Integer> choiceBox)
      Returns a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the dining room of the user's school.
      Parameters:
      maxStudents - the maximum number of students that can be selected from the dining room
      choiceBox - the choice box from which the number of students that can be selected is taken, the choice box is filled by the user before doing the character students selection
      Returns:
      a VBox that will contain a label and a button that will permit to chose students from the dining room of the user's school.

    • getSelectRealmChoiceBox

      private Pair<javafx.scene.layout.VBox,javafx.scene.control.ChoiceBox<RealmType>> getSelectRealmChoiceBox(String labelText)
      Returns a form used to choose a realm for characters that needs this type of choice. These characters are characters 9 and 12.
      Parameters:
      labelText - the label that describe for what type of action the selection will be used
      Returns:
      the form used to choose the number of students that will be swapped in character 7 or 10
